summary: A spaceship from Earth is trapped on the unknown planet. Based on book "Tumannost Andromedy" by Ivan Efremov.
cast: Vija Artmane|Sergey Stolyarov|Nikolai Kryukov|Tatyana Voloshina|Lado Tskhvariashvili|Lyudmila Chursina|Nikolay Duksin|Alim Fedorinsky|Aleksandr Gai|Valeri Gatayev|Yuri Gavrilyuk|Aleksandr Goloborodko|Vitold Janpavlis|Roman Khomyatov|Vladimir Kislenko|Tatiana Mayorova|Yuzef Mironenko|Valery Panarin|Alfred Shestopalov|Liana Shtefan|Jemal Sikharulidze|Lyudmila Sosyura|Gennadiy Yukhtin|Marina Yurasova
title: Tumannost Andromedy
